name: evoxy
description:
A game about evolving a mysterious facetted being. Change its colors and behaviors by bringing the brightly colored meteors that fall from the sky to the altars. Surely it is susceptible to such generosity?

It's up to you to form this being with your will, effort and with the power of evolution!

Controls
WASD to move about.
E to "offer" meteor at altar.
SPACE to jump.

Note
There is no sound.

Made for Ludum Dare 24 - "Evolution"
